snippet: With his multipurpose bathroom accessories made of silicone, the designer Josh Owen has been exploring what he calls other “overlooked opportunities” for that often overlooked room.
abstract: Designer Josh Owen creates silicone bathroom accessories meant to withstand moisture.
lead_paragraph: With his multipurpose bathroom accessories made of silicone, the designer Josh Owen has been exploring what he calls other “overlooked opportunities” for that often overlooked room.

headline.seo: Bathroom Accessories That Can Withstand a Little Steam
headline.main: Accessories That Can Withstand a Little Steam
headline.print_headline: Accessories That Can Withstand a Little Steam
